name: reveal.js-internation
description: Internation is a localization (i10n) or internationalization (i18n) plugin for Reveal.js that reads language dictionaries from JSON files. The author can add switches to the presentation to let the user choose a language.
keywords: reveal, reveal.js, reveal-plugin, plugin, internationalization, i18n, localization, i10n, rtl
author: Martijn De Jongh
